member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PROTECTION_FLAGS
member.summary: Contains flags that specify whether the Media Engine will play protected content, and whether the Media Engine will use the Protected Media Path (PMP).

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PROTECTION_FLAGS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_ENABLE_PROTECTED_CONTENT
member.summary: Enable playback of protected content. The Media Engine will not play DRM-protected content unless this flag is set. If you set this flag, also set the MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_CONTENT_PROTECTION_MANAGER attribute.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PROTECTION_FLAGS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_USE_PMP_FOR_ALL_CONTENT
member.summary: Use the Protected Media Path (PMP) for all playback, including clear (non-protected) content.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_PROTECTION_FLAGS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_USE_UNPROTECTED_PMP
member.summary: Create the PMP inside an unprotected process. You can use this option to play clear content, but not to play protected content.
